rows.label: qst102205_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh hey, there you are!
Thank goodness you're all right.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0002
rows.name:
Did you get the ingredients?
Ah, yes, perfect! Thanks!

rows.label: qst102205_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll cook them up in a jiffy.
Cooking is a talent of mine!

rows.label: qst102205_msg0101
rows.name:
I think I may have made a bit too much,
haha... There's still so much left.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0102
rows.name:
Oh, you want seconds? Thanks,
that gives me a bit of confidence!
Gulan spice is great, isn't it?

rows.label: qst102205_msg0103
rows.name:
Pretty much any fish is tasty when
you bake it with a bit of fruit and a
helping of good old fashioned spices!

rows.label: qst102205_msg0104
rows.name:
Some allies I fought with once
taught me that.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0105
rows.name: This recipe is all I have left of them...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0106
rows.name:
I was out collecting ingredients when
it happened. Like you guys just now.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0005
rows.name:
I was young and reckless at the time,
and before I knew it, I'd wandered
into some vicious monsters' territory.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0006
rows.name:
I ran straight back to the camp,
fast as I could, thinking I'd be
safe with the others...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0007
rows.name:
But the camp was in a quiet area, and
nobody expected a bunch of monsters
to suddenly descend on it.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0008
rows.name:
I was the only one equipped to fight,
and in the end, I was the only survivor.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0009
rows.name:
Sometimes I wish I hadn't gone back
to the camp. If I'd just let the monsters
eat me, everyone else would've been...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0010
rows.name: I'm sorry...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0011
rows.name:
You probably didn't want to
hear all this...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0012
rows.name:
Myself, I meant to ask you to tell me
all about Vandham, but I just...

rows.label: qst102205_msg0013
rows.name:
C'mon, it looks like Corden's
done eating too.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0014
rows.name:
We should go ask him about
our next tasks.

rows.label: qst102205_msg0015
rows.name:
Next time we get a break, you'd
better tell me about all the cool
stuff Vandham did!
